title: [K-12] Collaborative Reflection-based Teacher Mentoring Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of school educational environments
context.additional_context: A course optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, aiming to establish a collaborative reflective culture among teachers

learning_goals: Learners can complete reflective teaching journals with over 80% completion accuracy through collaborative activities with peer teachers.
Learners can attempt to build trust relationships among teachers by utilizing three or more open-ended questions in mentoring dialogues.
Learners can draft lesson improvement plans two or more times based on peer feedback in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
